issue.title: [Rust] [Ballista] Ballista plans must not include RepartitionExec
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12437](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12437). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ballista plans must not include RepartitionExec because it results in incorrect results. Ballista needs to manage its own repartitioning in a distributed-aware way later on. For now we just need to configure the DataFusion context to disable repartition.
